Component.name: Tether
Component.Description: A component which tethers one entity to another. The position can be adjusted, and the rotation is relative the the owning Entity's position and the user's head position.

EntityAttribute.name: target
EntityAttribute.description: Entity to which this owning Entity is tethered to.

FloatAttribute.name: rotateAround
FloatAttribute.description: How many degrees to rotate around the the entity, relative to the user.

FloatAttribute.name: yawOffset
FloatAttribute.description: After rotating around the entity, how much additional yaw to apply.
